# padding

**Instance Property**

The padding options for the Look Around view.

## Declaration

```swift
get padding(): Padding;
set padding(value: Padding);
```

## Discussion

For information on how to specify padding around a Look Around view, see [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Padding].

## Getting information about the Look Around object and its state

- **element**: A property that represents the Look Around view’s containing Document Object Model (DOM) element.
- **scene**: The Look Around scene the framework is displaying.
- **readyState**: A value that represents the loading state of the Look Around object.
- **LookAroundReadyState**: Values that indicate the state of the Look Around object in the browser.
